title: Sk8Border
about_sk8border: Sk8Border was created in Montréal in March/April 2018 for the Anti-Fascist Game Jam as a collaborative effort by Leif Halldór Ásgeirsson, Marc-André Toupin and Ben Wiley. It is built with PICO-8.
works_on_mobile: This game runs in your web browser - even on your phone!
binaries_from: Binaries for Linux, Windows and Mac are available from
wow_open_source: This game is open source. Woah!
or_load_in_pico8: Or load this cart in PICO-8!
pico8_font: Thanks to RhythmLynx for making the PICO-8 font available on the web, and to Zep for developing it!
